title: Weird Horizontal Blur Wave Affect
body: So I got a new laptop, it runs fine, so far csgo is the only other game I played, and when I went in to a custom league game to test things out I would get a weird wave affect that would go from top to bottom or bottom to top when I moved my champion. its a subtle wave that is horizontal, besides that it works fine but it bugs me so much. Anyone else have this/fix it?

replies.body: It sounds like you were experiencing screen tearing caused by a desync between your monitor's refresh rate  and the game's frame rate.  I'm glad to hear that everything is okay now!  Thanks for your help DTN, and Basin I wish you all the best in your next games.  Congrats on your new laptop!
